# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is a special opportunity tailored for someone as discerning as yourself. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
